CustomField.formula: IF( CONTAINS( RecordType.Name , "Home Automation" ), "Protection Source", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Solar" ), "N-Ergy", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Water" ), "Aqua Bright Water", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Remodel" ), "Latch", IF( CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, "Pest Control" ), "Jax Pro Pest", RecordType.Name)))))
CustomField.label: Industry Company
